website_summaries.verdict: Buyers should make sure they receive a genuine Ateco decorating set.
pros: 55-piece set with stainless tips, two flower nails, a coupler, and a plastic storage case
cons: Some buyers say their tips were not numbered or were not authentic

customer_reviews.title: Not all genuine ‘Ateco’- but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Tips are as described and priced at a great deal for beginners to start their collection of tips. Like many other reviews, I feel that not all tips are genuine Ateco brand. Two of the tips included are not larked ‘Ateco’ and say ‘made in Korea’ vs the genuine Ateco tips that just say ‘Korea’ - the metal on those teo tips does not seem the same quality as all of the other tips either. Knowing I had the chance of getting non genuine tips was a risk I took after reading many reviews. I won’t be returning the box of tips but think this issue should be resolved
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The case is pretty flimsy. Hinge broke off as a soon as I opened it. But the tips so far are great! So far no rust but I’m also meticulous about keeping them clean after use. Overall a great starter set for those who are beginners. Wish there was a size 3 in the set since this is what I use for flooding my cookies. Not a deal breaker though
customer_reviews.author: rac rach

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to upgrade my mismatch collection of tips! Love the quality of Ateco! Sadly my case is damaged so I’m going to have to find something else to put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaira Kyden

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. I like the case. It's a great value. I wish it had some of the bigger decorating tips, but for the smaller ones, it's a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Vida

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with the selection
customer_reviews.text: I got the product, and there were two tubes which feature welds - not what I expect of Ateco. Also, the kit did not include #168. I arranged for a replacement, and that kit was the same - two tips with welds (and not embossed with "Ateco") and no #168 (even though the box and website state that it's included in the kit). Overall, I'm happy with the selection. However, be aware that the kit is not quite as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: shamangrrl

customer_reviews.title: The right kit for the right price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a tip set for my wife. I have yet to give her this as her Christmas present, but I'm happy with the contents. After reading reviews for Ateco products and Wilton products, I went with the Ateco set. Amazon had the best price I could find online. The first one shipped without much packing material and the plastic case was cracked. I sent it back in and they had a replacement to me in about 2 days. This set looks like it's going to have everything she'll need (and I'm sure I'll get to use it too). After purchasing bags and couplers from a different retailer, she should be able to decorate anything imaginable!
customer_reviews.author: archiefl98

customer_reviews.title: Good investment, value for money.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the tubes is different from what is listed on the packing. That is why I give it 4 stars. However, it won't border me that much as the whole set will give me enough choice to do the decoration pipping. The plastic box is not that solid & a couple of the tubes cannot sit properly on the stand. I might need to look for a better storage box to re-house them in the future. Overall, I am happy with this purchase as this is a budget buy for a beginner learning cake decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilmood

customer_reviews.title: Cases arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Purchased twice both cases arrived broken. Not even going to bother returning the second one. Disappointed because I ordered this because I wanted a case for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, high-quality decorating tubes. I love having the variety. I do wish that the container they came in was a little better. The tubes are always coming loose and rattling around, making it hard to close and the pieces for making roses don't really fit very well. Also, a very nice addition to this would be a little booklet of instructions/information. I'm not sure if they just assume you know how to use all of these if you are getting them or what, but this came with nothing at all in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wilson

customer_reviews.title: OK. But needs manual of tips and their designs.
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Lots of tips. I like that each tip has it's number stamped on it. Part of the packaging has an idea of the types of designs the tips will produce, but only a few of the tips. So like so many of the other tip kits, you have to be an expert to really use them. They just don't have manuals with pictures to allow you to be successful with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. I first tried to use this on pistachio frosting which was dumb on my part because it had tiny tiny pieces of pistachio that kept clogging the tips. That was completely my fault for not thinking things through. They clean up fantastically though, just run under a little hot water and you're good to go. The only complaint I have with this set is I wish they would include more than one coupler... Other than that though it is a good diverse set.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, versatile product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year to make my son's birthday cake and really found the variety of tips very useful for decorating. I am new to cake decorating and found the tips easy to use with a little practice. The tips are of good quality, wash well in hot water and store nicely in the storage container they come in. Overall, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: andreocles

customer_reviews.title: Great set, variety and storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. so many tips, great for all kinds of decorating choices and in a neat case that neatly stores the tips. Worth the price, I use this set all the time. It doesn't have all the tips necessary, so you will need to supplement with other tips from your local store, but it has nearly all the ones you need to get started.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Love this starter set. No issues. The only minus was the box cane cracked. But I will not be using the box later.
customer_reviews.author: Olena B

customer_reviews.title: So many tips!
customer_reviews.text: This assortment of tips had all the ones I was looking for, great assortment. I won't go into all of them as other reviews had them listed. The case is a bit annoying as the lid won't shut unless everything is perfectly aligned and it's hard to get them perfectly aligned, but otherwise, it's a perfect set.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: i love it great quality and great price! yes the box is cheap and doesn't secure the tips too good, but i purchased this for the tips not the storage case. the case was just a plus. so i don't know why people complain about the case when there here for the tips!!! it wouldve been triple the price if i bought something like this else where. so great product. also this is not made in the usa
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P.

customer_reviews.title: Great except the case
customer_reviews.text: The case is a little flimsy but the tips work great just get a baby brush to clean them
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Negaard

customer_reviews.title: It makes me doubt that they are 100% originals
customer_reviews.text: In general I think this is a great product and I'm happy whit it. I rather 4 stars because in most of the tips is written Ateco and the number of the tip but two of them (70 and 90) just have the number on them but not the Ateco name and they look different material (inferior). All of them, except 70 and 90 tips, have Korea written in them.
customer_reviews.author: Natisma Julieta Lopez Salas

customer_reviews.title: Box came broken.
customer_reviews.text: The tips are great however the box came broken and I don't have time to go and return it.
customer_reviews.author: NIM949

customer_reviews.title: Great tips!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great deal. There are so many different designs to choose from. There was even a thick enough tip to make meatloaf "cupcakes" with mashed potato "icing" on top. All of the tip variations can make for a great day of decorating pastries and more.
customer_reviews.author: Leighav

customer_reviews.title: I love Ateco, their products are so affordable and very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Ateco, their products are so affordable and very well made! This set is just awesome!!! It has everything you need and more!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great tips!
customer_reviews.text: They're really good quality tips. I'm not a professional cake decorator or anything, but i enjoy doing it from time to time, for my family and friends. These tips are great, and I love that it has a coupler, although I wish there were at least a couple. But it's a great set, especially for people that use it just for fun!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina C.

customer_reviews.title: Overall really good set
customer_reviews.text: Wilton hardly ever disappoint me. This is a nice little set, and for the most part it fit well in the case. The only thing I didn't like was the flower nails only because they seem to not fit well. But other than that it's a really good set, a very good beginner set.
customer_reviews.author: tmsk2011

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when opening plastic storage case.
customer_reviews.text: Great pastry tips, horrible storage case. The latch broke within a few weeks after getting this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with the purchase. It’s tricky knowing what they all do by the photo that comes on the package. Just gotta try them all out to get a good understanding. Can’t wait to do more decorating with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different shaped tubes and in several sizes. Everything you need to make different designs. After I initially took the tubes out to wash them I had had a bit of trouble getting them all back in so that the lid would latch.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Good toys in a stinky box
customer_reviews.text: The latch broke and the box isn't terrible useful or well-designed. Having a lot of fun with the heads. I use them in acrylic painting, so my pros and cons will be very different from most people's. Lots of textures and shapes to play with. i bet they work even better with actual icing.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my sis-in-law in canada. She has started a business making cakes. She is very so I thought these would be great for her. She said she loves all the items I sent and was very surprised. Good price for all of these too.
customer_reviews.author: tamarasshop

customer_reviews.title: Pastry chef approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my mother who is a pastry chef. She uses it every day and it has held up great. The assortment of ends was perfect for what she needed. They can be put in the dishwasher after use and they come clean as when they were purchased. I would buy this product again if needed but since they don't wear out they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Burris

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: id say in the last six months I had gotten very interested in Baking and since getting these things I have litterally been making more money from cakes then i get from my full time job, these are awesome, the only thing is i had to open up the big and small rose tip at the skinny end a little because my rose pettels where tearing and it was not because of the consistancy of the icing, once opened a tiney bit they where flawless.
customer_reviews.author: keith crouthamel

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Case
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived with shattered corner on the back where the hinge is so the case is totally worthless. Because I need the tips right away, I will be keeping it but I'm disappointed that the storage box is worthless now.
customer_reviews.author: Faith B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the assortment, but was not sure from the pictures. I needed a Bismark, filling tube, and some pictures included it and others did not. When I received the set, it was included, but I had already ordered a separate set of Bismark tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: The price was right and the wife is starting to bake cakes for customers. I reviewed several sets and this was the best for the money. Ateco is good quality with everything she needed to get a good start. She was thrilled and has enjoyed using them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set so much, can't wait to use them all!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: Cake Boss
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a birthday present for my best friend. I definately think this product was a good buy. I was a little sketchy about the storage box's sturdiness when I ordered it- but it appears to be very durable. It is a little difficult to close sometimes because the flower petal stands move around and get in the way of the closing clips, but if you just take those two pieces out it will close just fine. As far as the tips- they are superb. They flow very smoothly and are very fun to play around with while deocorating.
customer_reviews.author: MrsuperHOTROD

customer_reviews.title: Great selection
customer_reviews.text: Great selection. Great quality. Wish they came with a brush to get them good and clean but whatever, that's my own pet peeve. Love the storage case. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Tip sizes in description, not the tips recieved. So very disappointed, bought these to use for sisters wedding next week and all the tips are wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Not Impressed

customer_reviews.title: Decorating Set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent decorating set for half the price it would have cost me here in Australia. So good my daughter took mine and I have just ordered a 2nd one plus put so many of my baking friends onto this great set at a brilliant price. Contains everything the home cake decorator could want, including flower nails. Package arrived well wrapped, nil damage and very speedy delivery. Storage box is good, as nozzles go back where they belong and not lost in a drawer! Would recommend this set to anyone from first time decorators to those with a higher level of decorating expertise.
customer_reviews.author: Dirtgirl

customer_reviews.title: RECOMENDO
customer_reviews.text: NEM USEI TUDO AINDA. MAS NAO ME ARREPENDO DE MANEIRA ALGUMA DE TER COMPRADO, POIS SEI QUE QUEM GOSTA DE CONFEITAR BOLOS OU BISCOITOS, TEM MAIS É QUE TER O QUE HA DE MELHOR NESSA ÁREA. ENTAO, GOSTEI DEMAIS DESSE PRODUTO.
customer_reviews.author: leila lima

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great selection -wonderful organizer easy to clean and find tips
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Kit
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to the cake decorator's stash of essentials at a fraction of the price of other similar products. This is conveniently arranged for ease of viewing, storage and selection. It co tains the most commonly used icing tips. I am very pleased with the product and would not hesitate to recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it and thinking about purchasing another one. Nice case love all the different tips.Very happy with this purchase it is the first time I have used amazon
customer_reviews.author: mike lasek

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: i love the variety and the many choices that i can now design my cakes. i wish they stayed in place better though, but other than that, they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: pikachupsyduck

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I was looking for. the tips are great quality and dont bend easily. I like the plastic case to keep things organized but wish it was designed a little better and higher quality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner baker!
customer_reviews.text: The box is made out of Some sort of plastic witch will break verry easely! I would have liked it if there was a Card with it to show you witch tip does what! Excuse my wrighting Im dutch!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Love This Set!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I purchased this ! All tips were in held snug in place and the container was undamaged. I have used them dozens of times now, no rust, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: raye1

customer_reviews.title: nice set
customer_reviews.text: very nice set that comes in a convenient carrying case. this product washes easily and the quality is excellent. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bogar Truck

customer_reviews.title: ... were so many pieces for this set at a great price and that they are stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: Was thrilled that there were so many pieces for this set at a great price and that they are stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived very quickly and in good shape. I needed some replacement tips since mine are quite old and this has everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny and John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Nice to know we can decorate a cake just like the professionals do! Simple to use and costs less than ordering a professional cake!
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: An excellent set
customer_reviews.text: I *love* Ateco products, and this is no exception. Comes with all your standard, frequent-flyer tips, as well as some crazy ones I can't wait to find a use for. No seams in the metal, and a rolled edge along the bottom of each tip. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Montelongo

customer_reviews.title: Great variety of tips!
customer_reviews.text: Package contains a great variety of tips, very pleased with my purchase! Very happy with everything I've purchased from Ateco, to date.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Have used quite a few of these already. I can't be without them ever.
customer_reviews.author: Meena

customer_reviews.title: Great tips, case sucks
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated the case is less than stellar. The tips are awesome, and cover just about everything you could need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for Royal Icing Flowers
customer_reviews.text: Great value and a good variety for beginners on up. Used with royal icing.
customer_reviews.author: BethF

customer_reviews.title: Tips
customer_reviews.text: The tips wereOK, however the plastic box (slotted container), leaves muc to be desired. It does not close and open with ease, the tips platings have to be puzzled out in order to not damag the and bend some of the teeth on the taller star shaped ones. More space should have been left under the upper lid in order to fit a thin layer of protective spong.
customer_reviews.author: Di HarNaj

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The product was everything my wife wanted at a great price. I would definitely recommend this product. I read other reviews in which people mention the tips rusting, so my wife is very cautious to clean them as soon as she finishes using them, and she has had no problems thus far. She's happy; I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my cake design class. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: The round tip nozzles comes in a few good sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel works well. The round tip nozzles comes in a few good sizes!
customer_reviews.author: YoHanYing

customer_reviews.title: Happy but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I like the set but when going through it I found I had 2 on the #32 tip. Upon closer inspection I was missing #264 #168 #21 and #34. In their place I had #59 #71 #502 and a double on the #32. While I did not want to return it as I still like the set I am confused as to how this could occur.
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I'm 15 and I love decorating, and I love practicing with these. My only problem is that I now have the decorating tips, and the icing bags, but not the little connector thing that connects them together lol. I've just been taping it together but if anyone could tell me what the little thing is called, it would be greatly appreciated. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good item, more than I expected, great service and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon A. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love playing with these. There are tips in this set I've never seen before.
customer_reviews.author: Kyndle S

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled to receive my frosting tips. I have always used Wilton tips and was apprehensive in ordering these, but after doing a bit of research, I decided to order them... I was not disappointed, They are just as good as Wilton maybe even better!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Collection!
customer_reviews.text: The tips were all so different and unique. With these tips I got so many other decorating options it was fantastic. I love wilton products and all but this tip set is a great deal for good quality tips in a large variety. (: I'd recommend it to any cake decorators.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great variation of tips to satisfy any job
customer_reviews.text: Like the range of different tips available in this set. Please note the instructions are only a small piece of cardboard stating which tips produce what pattern but should not deter you as more detailed and tutorials are available online.
customer_reviews.author: Tennielle

customer_reviews.title: case was broken...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews BEFORE I purchased this set. If I had known that other people had broken cases, I would have not purchased this set. The case was broken, and it couldn't be snapped closed. This was given as a gift. I would have returned it but recipient said to not worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Durable and of good quality. Perfect for a first time baker. Job well done Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing quality, much better than Wilton. There is a large variety of tips and I paid about $35 for the set, which is a great bargain. The tips do not have seams, which is nice and I believe these will last forever. I agree with others that the case could be a little nicer, I don't think it will last forever especially since I will be toting it back and forth to culinary school, but if it was just going to stay in my kitchen I wouldn't be worry about it at all. Overall I think this is an awesome product that will please everyone!
customer_reviews.author: D. Brue

customer_reviews.title: thank you
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these for my daughter for Christmas. she is very excited to start decorating cakes and cupcakes. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Hinman

customer_reviews.title: Set is large and versatile, but some pieces are not as listed shown with packaging
customer_reviews.text: I received my order in a very timely matter and packaging was perfectly adequate. Granted, I will most likely not use all 52 different decorating tips, however, I wanted to note that there were 9 tips which were missing from my kit/that weren't listed on the included list of contents. Here is what I noticed. Tips numbered: 46°, 47, 48°, 61, 88, 100, 108, 168, 225 were missing. Instead I got: 46, 47°, 48, 60, 70, 87, 99, 191, and 193. Obviously some of these tips seem to be interchangeable varying only slightly in size by a millimeter, no big deal. Still, I think the assembly of this kit should be supervised more carefully. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful set.
customer_reviews.text: So many tips to choose from. This is a wonderful set.
customer_reviews.author: Courttt

customer_reviews.title: Icing on the cake
customer_reviews.text: This was a splurge for myself. I can't wait to try them. Having everything neatly in one box is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn G Konecki

customer_reviews.title: excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: good price excellent quality to keep in orders ur tips good choice i made tu purchase this set of tips from ateco.
customer_reviews.author: yokaira

customer_reviews.title: So ..so...
customer_reviews.text: One of the piping tips came a little bit crushed so the star shape doesn't come out well.. And the box does not closes properly .
customer_reviews.author: patricia romero

customer_reviews.title: I have the Wilton and the Ateco Set and I have to say I love them both
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely haapy with the tips. I have the Wilton and the Ateco Set and I have to say I love them both, but the Ateco one has a so much better price. I use them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tips of good quality and signed. The box is not very well done quickly broken latch.
customer_reviews.author: Elisaveta

customer_reviews.title: A gift for the Wife.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife as a x-mas present. She loved it. Has been using it on cupcakes. And I get to be the the test subject. So win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS, IT HAS EVERYTHING I WANTED AND MORE....HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! IF YOU ARE INTO BAKING OR GOING TO SCHOOL LIKE ME, THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT YOU NEED, IT IS VERY COMPLETE.
customer_reviews.author: Yai

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO BAD
customer_reviews.text: I received these and noticed some were slightly bent. They will still do the job as they are not too bad. It was packaged o.k and the tubes stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: didn't have the tip I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have a number 7 tip that I needed. If I would have known this I wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Kain

customer_reviews.title: Great set of decorating tips
customer_reviews.text: good quality for a reasonable price! i'm excited to use these tips when i bake cupcakes. thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great products and easy use! I'm a beginner and I was able to use the equipment! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: cake
customer_reviews.text: this item arrived in perfect condition. it was packed very carefully. I live in Alaska and it comes a long way to me and it was in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Ateco tips
customer_reviews.text: These tips are a great deal and you have a tip size for just about anything you want to make.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: the box is broken when opened the wrap,
customer_reviews.text: the box is broken when opened the wrap, but the products is good
customer_reviews.author: Xianghao Kong

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: very handy with so many tubes and a case to keep them all together... have not have many opportunites to use them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sofyah

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing. All the pieces are very functional and even the case is ok, but its lock is very fragile. It broke very easily. That's the only defect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ger

customer_reviews.title: Comment
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baking needs. Hope That they include ateco pastry bag to complete the sets. Hope that they also include the instruction
customer_reviews.author: cherry ann

customer_reviews.title: kdsajcnd;sKBFAWE;FNB
customer_reviews.text: My Gosh! These are amazing! I am seriously in deco heaven! Buy....just click "add to cart". You won't regret it! <3 ONE HAPPY CUSTOMER!
customer_reviews.author: Mila

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tips are just OK, because they aren't made of high quality stainless steel and are not heavy enough; very light and too thin. Stainless steel is normally heavy and has shine appearance. The box container quality is not that good, it needs more improvement for the packaging. The delivery is late, not on time. Well, overall just OK, and at least I have sorts of tips to decor my cake.
customer_reviews.author: Dewi Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: I got my 55 piping tips set Today. Everything looks good but the box was a disapointment. I am sure the company can come up with a better quality box for this nice set. The box looks cheap and just nothing to it, even tip don't hold tight, i hate it. So i will find me a better place to storage my new set.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Cake Tips
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife for christmas. We have not used them physically yet. But I can say thus far they are not held snugly and when I took them out of the package they were all around inside the plastic case. They look and appear identical to the Wilton brand tips so that should be a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Eiting

customer_reviews.title: so many choices
customer_reviews.text: Used it for cupcakes and had so many options. Good quality and nice case. This is for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: paula walker

customer_reviews.title: started to rust, tip#143
customer_reviews.text: I tend to soak my tips over night when we use them to get rid of the icing inside. The next day I would clean, rinse, and dry them off. I than realize there was rust inside tip# 143. Very disappointed in this product, this is made of stainless steel. Also this was the first time using tip#143, we had other tips inside the bowl where we soak the tips and this was the only one with this issue. Never had this problem before with my other tips.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ruan

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I am so sorry! I was so happy to get started on creating my cakes with my new decorating set. Thank You. I love them. Linda
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Good luck
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and what was promised to be a 55 piece set with 52 tips was actually a 43 piece set - 1 case, 2 nails, a coupler and 39 tips.
customer_reviews.author: leftfoot

product_meta.title: Ateco 783-55 Piece Cake Decorating Set, Includes 52 Stainless Steel Tubes, 1 Standard Coupler, 2 Flower Nails in Hinged Storage Box, 55, Silver
product_meta.description: Ateco's 52-Piece Decorating Tube Set with Hinged Storage Box contains 52 of Ateco's most popular decorating tubes, coupler, two flower nails and instructions in a plastic storage container. Assembled in US made of domestic and imported components by Ateco. Since 1905, Ateco has supplied fine restaurants and bakeries with quality built, specialty baking tools. Ateco products are internationally renowned for their high quality. When you use Ateco products, you're not only enjoying quality craftsmanship, you're also enjoying quality design; the products are a result of over one hundred years and four generations of innovation and development. Tips are made of stainless steel.
feature_bullets: Set includes coupler, flower nails and Ateco's most popular decorating tubes
Includes instructions and a plastic storage container
Tips are made of stainless steel
By Ateco, professional quality and quality design
